LandingPage.subtitle: Stop wasting time switching between apps. Ribotflow unifies your CRM, sales, and communications so you can focus on what truly matters: growing your business.
LandingPage.feature1Text: Simplify your business management with a centralized system. 360Â° customer view, complete interaction history, and a Kanban sales pipeline to reduce time and errors.
LandingPage.feature2Text: Sync your email to automatically convert new contacts into leads. Schedule and automate posts on your social networks to always stay present.
LandingPage.feature3Text: Discover and collaborate with other nearby professionals. The community map allows you to offer services, find collaborators, or share resources within your sector and area.
LandingPage.feature4Text: Get an instant summary of pending invoices, tasks, and appointments directly on Telegram. Your assistant keeps you informed without constant logins.
LandingPage.feature5Text: Always stay up-to-date on grants available in your sector and location. Don't miss out on funding opportunities for your business.
LandingPage.feature6Text: The AI scores leads, suggests responses, and detects hidden opportunities. Customizable dashboards show key metrics so you can make decisions with confidence.
